tutorial.description: Developing Qt applications using C++ and the Qt Widgets module.

tutorial.description: Using Qt Creator to develop a cross-platform application for mobile devices and other small devices.

tutorial.description: Using Qt Creator to develop a Qt Quick application for Android devices.

tutorial.description: Structuring an application that combines QML and C++ code, looking up QML language scope and names, creating custom views, handling user input, and styling applications.

tutorial.description: Making applications load network data faster.

tutorial.description: Learning about the signal and slot syntax in Qt 5.

tutorial.description: Using Qt add-ons for data compression, plotting with axis, multithreaded tasks, configuration, modeling items, and core tasks.

tutorial.description: Learning about type erasure based on QVariant and the capabilities introduced in Qt 5.2.

tutorial.description: Using trace viewing and analysis and profiling tools to solve typical Qt UI performance problems on embedded devices.
